notes: This is a modern, newly renovated unfurnished apartment with clean white walls, light wood laminate flooring, recessed lighting, and split AC units in multiple rooms. Excellent natural light from large floor-to-ceiling windows. Very baby-safe layout with no visible balconies, stairs, or sharp corners - flat single-level design with built-in wardrobes and shelving. The 7th floor in a 26-story building confirms elevator access.
